name: Space Racer (TheObserverStudios)
description:
This is a game where you race against the clock around a track in space! But be careful, your ship is prone to breaking, so you'll have to fix it when it does.

When you first launch the game, you will be at the main menu. When you hit play you better be ready to go, because there is no countdown, the race has started!

 Press Tab to switch between Fixing mode and driving mode. 

In fixing mode, swap between the 9 systems to repair them as they break using the buttons in the bottom left. Each system has a direct impact on your ability to fly your ship, and each system's status is shown on the bar at the top. 1 indicates that the system is currently working, while 0 indicates that it is currently broken. Some systems display a number which indicates their efficiency, and one displays a timer. 


In driving mode, use WASD to control your ship. 

Race Through the track and try to beat the Developer, ME. I have a best time of -------! Good Luck!

sorry for no sound :(
